mapper.select: select sum(case when comment_level='1' then 1 else 0 end) as goodCounts, sum(case when comment_level='2' then 1 else 0 end) as normalCounts, sum(case when comment_level='3' then 1 else 0 end) as badCounts, count(item_id) as totalCounts from items_comments where item_id = #{itemId}

select ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickName from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{commentLevel}
